Description.NLSCatalog: The aixpert command sets a variety of system configuration settings to enable the desired security level.

The following coarse-grain security settings are available: High Level Security. Medium Level Security. Low Level Security. Default Security: Original system default security. SOX-COBIT Best Practices Security: Commonly accepted security configuration for SOX-COBIT compliance.

Set.Argument: `case %v1 in 'HLS') echo 'h';; 'MLS') echo 'm';; 'LLS') echo 'l';; 'DLS') echo 'd';; 'SCBPS') echo 's';; *) echo 'd';; esac`
